lead_paragraph: After an emotional victory over Roger Federer the night before, Andy Roddick was beaten by Nikolay Davydenko, 7-6 (5), 6-2, in the semifinals of the Sony Ericsson Open on Friday night in Key Biscayne, Fla.
snippet: After an emotional victory over Roger Federer the night before, Andy Roddick was beaten by Nikolay Davydenko, 7-6 (5), 6-2, in the semifinals of the Sony Ericsson Open on Friday night in Key Biscayne, Fla.
